article:
Molly's brother Sammy liked to play the guitar and sing. The _ made him happy and _ him of many happy times . He wrote a lot of _ and played them for his family. There was _ that Sammy wanted more to do except music .
But one day Sammy _ a tree. _ he fell off and hurt his arm badly.
The doctor at the hospital told him his arm would never _ again. It made him very sad . His sister Molly felt sad too. She knew how down he was. She wished that she could _ him out. She told him to be positive  , and she would help him _ difficult times .
Sammy smiled a bit, because his sister seemed to care. She _ him her support and he was glad that she was there. When Sammy returned home from the hospital, he could not wait to _ up his guitar and tried to play a small piece of music, _ Sammy's arm did not work right, the music all _ wrong. He became so upset  and threw his guitar out.
Then Molly ran _ and took Sammy's guitar out of the dirty old dustbin, and said, "Can you teach me to play? " So Sammy showed Molly what he knew about guitar, and before long , she could play just like a _ . Sammy smiled again.
Music is a miracle  when things seem to go wrong.
